name: Yathrib
description:
A short mod that me, Pancakes, have made over the span of a month. Mostly just about going from map to map and solving small puzzles.

You need the following games to play this mod:

  • Half-Life 2
  • Half-Life 2: Episode 2

Made by Pancakes with the help of KazerLight
